1.name: Limbo
desc: "   You are floating in a formless void, detached from all sensation of physical
matter, surrounded by swirling glowing light, which fades into the relative
darkness around you without any trace of edges or shadow.
There is a "No Tipping" notice pinned to the darkness.

15.name: Work Room of the Lords
desc: "    This is where the lords are supposed to be working away hard at helping
the imps get done what needs to be done asap. If your not a lord and your in
here you had better hope your up for promotion or you can pass through walls.
There is a board nailed up on the wall with a list of things to do.

16.name: Gossip Room of the Lords
desc: "   This is where the Lords can catch up on all the latest
scandal and rumor in the mortal world they administer.
In this room rests the MUDs only tabloid rag, the Adventurer's

17.name: World Room of the Lords
desc: "   This is the room where the Lord's can keep up to date
with the latest building assignments and details for the
MUD.  Fionn's infamous WorldPad usually resides in this room,

18.name: Questing Room
desc: "   This is the room where the Lord's can keep up to
date with the latest questing details and plotlines.

19.name: The Kitchen
desc: "   Welcome to the kitchen of the gods.  A rather barren
affair, yellow formica dominates this grimy galley.  A
small collection of cooking utensils hanging from rusty
hooks gathers dust and a rather ill-treated rabble of
pots and pans hang beside them.  A hobby-book spice rack
threatens to collapse, showering an intruder with flakes
of unidentifiable plant-life.  The only sound eminates
from a well-rounded fridge, covered in take-out menus.
A microwave's green digital read-out glares at you from

49.name: Monster Storage
desc: "   This is where the errant monsters are stored.  I don't know why they
are in here, but they seem to show up often enough.
